education_text.0: Volker Strassen (born April 29, 1936) is a German      mathematician, a professor emeritus in the department of mathematics and statistics at the      University of Konstanz University of KonstanzVolker Strassen (born April 29, 1936) is a German      mathematician, a professor emeritus in the department of mathematics and statistics at the      University of Konstanz University of KonstanzStrassen began his researches as a probabilistIn 1969, Strassen shifted his research efforts towards the      Analysis of algorithms analysis of algorithms with a paper on      Gaussian elimination Gaussian elimination, introducing
